THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
18.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

ee
2024/KER/4497
CRL.MC NO. 138 OF 2024 2
ORDER

This Crl.M.C is filed by the sole accused in SC No.1098/2021
on the file of Fast Track Special Court-ll Perinthalmanna, for
quashing Annexure IV _ order dated 6/1/2024, on the ground that,
his counsel was not heard as to his readiness before scheduling
the case for trial.

2. On direction from this Court, report dated 16/1/2024 was
submitted by learned Special Judge stating _ that,
SC.No.1098/2021 stands adjourned to 24/1/2024, and on that day
the case will be re-scheduled for trial, after hearing both sides.

In the result Annexure IV order is set aside. Learned Special
Judge, Perinthalmanna is directed to reschedule the trial of
SCNo.1098/2021, on 24/1/2024, after hearing both sides, as to
their readiness.

With these directions, this Crl.M.C stands disposed of.

Sd/-
SOPHY THOMAS
JUDGE
